details.title: Deco Reverse Sombrero Oxford
details.description: The Scarpa di Bianco Italian footwear collection was founded by Bill White in 2009. Di Bianco offers a very sophisticated selection of boots, shoes, and flats from Italy. The combination of impeccable models and details with contemporary colors and styling, results in decidedly current, yet elegant models. The aim of the Scarpa di Bianco company is to offer men a custom-shoe buying experience through a multitude of models, lasts, sizes, leathers, and color options.
